title: Reorder Product Filters on Category Page
description: A merchandiser wants to change the order of filters on a category page, moving 'Brand' to be the top filter instead of 'Size'.

tasks.description: Select the category page to be edited.
Retrieve the current order of filters for that page.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees the current order is ['Size', 'Color', 'Brand'].

tasks.description: Update the filter order to the new desired sequence.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully changes the order to ['Brand', 'Size', 'Color'].
